description.title: Water Settings Description
description.description: Contains non-component settings for the water settings.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The identifier for these water settings.

particle_concentrations.title: Particle Concentrations
particle_concentrations.description: The composition of particles in a body of water is what determines its color and how light behaves as it travels through the water

cdom.title: Cdom
cdom.description: Concentration of chromophoric dissolved organic matter in mg/L; higher concentrations produce more yellow/yellow-brown colors

chlorophyll.title: Chlorophyll
chlorophyll.description: Concentration of chlorophyll in mg/L; higher concentrations produce more green colors

suspended_sediment.title: Suspended Sediment
suspended_sediment.description: Concentration of suspended sediment in mg/L; higher concentrations produce more red/red-brown colors

waves.title: Waves
waves.description: Waves are an optional effect that can be used to complement water surface animations to make your water appear more realistic.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Whether or not waves are on or off

depth.title: Depth
depth.description: Controls the amount of wave displacement

direction_increment.title: Direction Increment
direction_increment.description: Controls how much the heading changes between each octave

frequency.title: Frequency
frequency.description: Controls the size of individual waves; higher values create more tightly packed waves

frequency_scaling.title: Frequency Scaling
frequency_scaling.description: Controls how much frequencies change in subsequent octaves

mix.title: Mix
mix.description: Controls how much each octave will blend into the neighboring octave

octaves.title: Octaves
octaves.description: Determines how many layers of waves to simulate; high values result in more complex waves

pull.title: Pull
pull.description: Controls how much smaller waves are pulled into larger ones

sampleWidth.title: Sample Width
sampleWidth.description: Controls the resolutions of the fractal effect; higher values result in smoother waves

shape.title: Shape
shape.description: Adjusts the shape of the wave

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: Controls the starting speed of the first waves

speed_scaling.title: Speed Scaling
speed_scaling.description: Controls how much faster/slower subsequent octaves move

caustics.title: Caustics
caustics.description: Caustics are an effect that make bodies of water more realistic by projecting light rays on underwater surfaces.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Whether or not caustics are on or off

frame_length.title: Frame Length
frame_length.description: How many seconds to spend on each frame of animation in the caustics texture

power.title: Power
power.description: Controls how bright the caustics effect appears

scale.title: Scale
scale.description: Controls how size of the repetition of the caustics texture

texture.title: Texture
texture.description: Resource location to a texture for controlling the shape of the caustics; if not used, a built-in Minecraft texture will be supplied automatically

A.title: Format Version
A.description: A version that tells minecraft what type of data format can be expected when reading this file.
